text: Meredith Kolodner is an American journalist, and staff writer for the Hechinger Report. She won The Sidney Award for 2019. ==Life== She graduated from Brown University and Columbia University School of Journalism. She worked for the New York Daily News, InsideSchools.org and The Investigative Fund of The Nation Institute.
